snippet: A day after the documentary “Unclaimed,” which suggests that a former P.O.W. was found alive in Vietnam, played at a film festival, the Defense Department said the man was a fraud.
abstract: Defense Department refutes suggestion made in Michael Jorgensen's documentary Unclaimed that John Hartley Robertson, former American prisoner of war who was shot in Laos in 1968, is still alive and living in Vietnam.
lead_paragraph: A day after the documentary “Unclaimed,” which suggests that a former P.O.W. was found alive in Vietnam, played at a film festival, the Defense Department said the man was a fraud.

headline.seo: U.S. Says Man in the Film ‘Unclaimed’ Is Not an Ex-P.O.W.
headline.main: Documentary Is as Murky as Vietnam Itself Was
headline.print_headline: Documentary Is as Murky As Vietnam Itself Was

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
